mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_time ,super_flag from sys_menu
mapper.select: where 1 = 1 and super_flag = #{superFlag} and status = 0 order by parent_id, order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = '0' AND m.super_flag = 0 and exists ( select 0 from sys_temp_menu stm where stm.temp_id = #{tempId} and stm.menu_id = m.menu_id )
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND m.super_flag = 1 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 and m.super_flag = 0 and exists ( select 0 from sys_temp_menu stm where stm.temp_id = #{tempId} and stm.menu_id = m.menu_id ) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.super_flag = 0 and m.menu_id not in (select m.parent_id from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m where m.status = '0' AND m.super_flag = 0 and exists ( select 0 from sys_temp_menu stm where stm.temp_id = #{tempId} and stm.menu_id = m.menu_id )
select count(1) from sys_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, super_flag, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{isFrame}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{superFlag}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.parent_id from sys_menu m where 1 =1 and exists ( select 0 from sys_temp_menu stm where stm.menu_id = m.menu_id and stm.temp_id = #{tempId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and m.menu_id not in (select m.parent_id from sys_menu m inner join sys_temp_menu stm on m.menu_id = stm.menu_id and stm.temp_id = #{tempId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
